channel.title: Redash bug while displaying BIGINT values
channel.description:
Redash has the following issues while displaying BIGINT values. Issue in the visualization as well as the difference in the actual returned value. Example below -
![Screen Shot 2022-02-07 at 10.49.03 PM (2)|649x500](upload://pE7lo7UwKm6HkDF1rzYusg3rDTA.png)
I am using Redash 6, but I have also tried the same on Redash 10 and I am facing the same issue with v10 as well. Is this an existing issue? Can someone please suggest a solution for this?

item.title: Redash bug while displaying BIGINT values
item.dc:creator: pyhedgehog
item.description:
Secret is easy â€“ redash processes bigint as float and gains overflow:

>>> int(float(252672899128697211))

Read full topic
